metadata.title: CVE-2023-38426 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.4. ksmbd has anout-of-bounds read in smb2_find_context_vals when create_context's name_lenis larger than the tag length.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
